<<<<<<< HEAD
Poems, and translations by the author of the Satyrs upon the Jesuits. Selections. 1683 Oldham, John, 1653-1683.
[6], 215 p.
Printed for Jos. Hindmarsh ..., London : 1683.
Two of Oldham's works appeared with this same title. In this one, the first poem is "The eighth satyr of Monsieur Boileau, imitated." Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

[6], 215 p.
Printed for Jos. Hindmarsh ..., London : 1683.
Two of Oldham's works appeared with this same title. In this one, the first poem is "The eighth satyr of Monsieur Boileau, imitated." Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Jos. Hindmarsh
